channel.title: IF Answers - Recent questions tagged color

item.title: Quest: Hyperlink Text Colours
item.description:
Hey everyone.

I've just uploaded my Quest game to TextAdventures.co.uk, and it seems none of the hyperlink colours are working.

They worked in the test version, and the version I published and emailed to my testers - does anyone know why they might not be working in the uploaded version? The span=red> tags work, etc, just not the colors selected for the hyperlinks.

I'm thinking of just spanning them all, but if anyone has a solutions or theories?

I could post a link to the game, or my code, but I gotta' warn you though; very erotic furry content.

I can't post my code, it's over 8000 chars. Is there a way around this?

Game is here; http://play.textadventures.co.uk/Play.aspx?id=jbb8rbjs4e_hjp7pbkuiug
